sentences.sentence: During the flush times, salespeople were surly, waiters snobby.
sentences.translation: 在经济繁荣时期，销售人员态度粗暴，服务员势利。

sentences.sentence: In reflection, my firm belief in the power of the brand was naive, not to mention a bit snobby.
sentences.translation: 反思一下，我对品牌力量的坚定信念是幼稚的，更不用说是有点势利了。

sentences.sentence: It is (really) of no use to argue with such a snobby person.
sentences.translation: 与这种傲慢的人争吵没有用。
